general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs, schools, and initiatives at Sharda University for the 2025-26 academic year. It includes details on examinations, academic credits, curriculum feedback, university publications, and departmental offerings such as dental sciences, medical sciences, nursing, and skill development programs. The list also covers university governance, tenders, legal frameworks, health services (COVID-19, FCCS), capacity building, and entrepreneurial and innovative activities, including FM radio and a mentoring portal. International collaborations and specific courses on ethics and cybercrime reporting are also mentioned.

career_path.summary: This text outlines information about an engineering course, detailing how to apply, potential career paths like Offshore Design Engineer and Forensic Engineer, and salary expectations for graduates, with placements ranging from 4.50 LPA to 12.00 LPA. It also mentions recruiters and encourages taking the next step in an engineering career.
career_path.raw_content:

Career path you can choose after the course
